name: Kaiju Operation Shooter
description:
Mini Jam - May 2021

Theme : Kaiju 

Limitation : Death Isn't The End

Your mission is to escort and protect the mech on its way to eliminate a giant monster invasion.

Use WASD / arrow keys to move your player around.

Direct where to shoot using your mouse.

Keep our mech safe all the time. If either you or our mech dies, you will be sent into another dimension to get back to the past. Don't wander too long there, or you'll lose too much progress.

Remember, Death Isn't The End

Credits :

UI & Background art : Aymu

Sprites : JuicyBoot

Music & SFX : UrizenComposer

VA & Director : FreemanKiller

Programmer : Milicen
